channel.title: Comments for page "Billy Lvl. 3"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Billy Lvl. 3"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Just the mission's Difficulty, not the number of successes.

It's mainly so McM can put in higher difficulty missions without people being able to luck through with auto-wins.

item.title: Difficulty?
item.content:encoded:
Billy's description says "20% chance of auto-winning a regular mission of Difficulty 100 or less, and +4 Strength!"
What does it mean by "Difficulty 100"?
It doesn't mean difficulty as in the mission's 'difficulty and number of successes required,' does it?
